channel.title: GME – UMM - soggetto ai termini e alle condizioni del GME disponibili su https://pip.ipex.it/PipWa/Front/#/Legal_En
channel.description: TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE INSIDE INFORMATION PLATFORM (PIP) - PUBLIC SECTION https://pip.ipex.it The use of the websites https://pip.ipex.it, https://pip.ipex.it/PipWa/Front/GetAcerFeeds (each, the "Website") implies the implicit acceptance by the User of the general terms and conditions below (the "General Terms and Conditions"). Before proceeding with accessing the Website and information, data and, in general, informative contents published therewith, the User must carefully read and understand the General Terms and Conditions. 1 - PARTIES - These General Terms and Conditions are applicable between Gestore dei Mercati Energetici S.p.A., with registered office in Viale Maresciallo Pilsudski, 122/124, 00197 Rome, VAT and Tax code no. 06208031002 (GME) and the individual User of the Website and of the Protected Contents, as defined below, (whether a natural person, legal person or other entity) who acts on his/her/its own behalf and/or on behalf of the entity that he/she/it represents (the User). 2 – SCOPE - Subject to these General Terms and Conditions is the access to the Website, and the Protected Contents (as defined below), also through the RSS Feed, by the User, free of charge and for an unlimited period, under the terms and with the limits set out below. 3 - INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY - The User acknowledges and agrees that all information and data (by way of example and not limited to, the messages containing the preliminary information, the lists of plants indicated by each market participant) published on the Website (the "Protected Contents") and the Website itself are the exclusive property of or held under license by GME, or are the exclusive property of third parties and, in any case, are protected by national laws and international conventions on intellectual and/or industrial property. 4 - LICENSE – Access to the Website and its Protected Contents, even through the RSS Feed, implies that GME solely grants to the User a personal, free-of-charge, non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicensable license, limited to the right to view and use the Website and Protected Content only for informative purposes of a private nature, with the explicit prohibition for the User to use the Protected Content and the Website for economic and/or commercial purposes, directly or indirectly. This license can be revoked, in whole or in part, at any time and at own discretion, by GME without notice. In any case, the legitimate use by the User of Protected Contents must be made by mention of the source of the Protected Contents (i.e. "Source: Inside Information Platform managed by Gestore dei Mercati Energetici S.p.A."). 5 - UNAUTHORISED USES – It is forbidden to the User, without the prior written consent of GME, to publish, reproduce, store, transmit electronically or by other means, create summaries and/or extracts, distribute, market, translate and/or however use, in whole or in part, the Website and/or the Protected Contents, for whatever economic and/or commercial purpose and/or otherwise lucrative purpose. Breach of this provision involves reporting by GME to the Judicial Authority to ascertain the relevant criminal and/or administrative liability and the consequent possible enforcement of penalties prescribed by Law. 6 - TRUTHFULNESS, ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS AND UPDATING OF THE PUBLISHED DATA - In view of the purpose of the Protected Contents posted on the Website, the User acknowledges and agrees that GME cannot be held liable, except in ascertained cases of willful misconduct or gross negligence, for any damage that may result from use of the Website or of the Protected Contents taken from the latter. GME makes no warranty on the truthfulness, accuracy, completeness and update of the Protected Contents published within the pages of the Website, and disclaims any liability or responsibility for errors or omissions relating thereto. 7 - ACCURACY OF OTHER DATA - The User acknowledges and agrees that GME has no control over external sites accessible via connection and, therefore, is not responsible nor liable for their contents. The User must be aware that GME cannot guarantee the truthfulness, accuracy, completeness and updating of the information contained in the Website that come from sources other than GME, and GME cannot avoid that information from sources believed to be reliable however may in some circumstances be inaccurate, incomplete or out of date, for any reason, including any technical problems or causes beyond the control of GME. 8 - SUSPENSION OF SERVICE - The User acknowledges and agrees that GME is not liable nor responsible for direct or indirect damages, arising from any interruptions, delays or anomalies related to access and/or use of the Website and Protected Contents, even through the RSS Feed, dependent on the supply of electricity or telephone service, due to fortuitous events or force majeure or other causes related to the medium through which the Website is published. 9 - DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY – The User will use the Protected Contents and navigate in the Website at the User’s sole risk. GME and its employees, directors, agents, employees or third parties involved in the creation, production or putting on line of the Website, disclaim any liability for any and all damages arising from the User’s access to, or any use of, the Website. Notwithstanding the above, GME represents that the Website, and the Protected Contents, are made available to the User as they are, without any warranty, express or implied, including, but not limited to, their fitness or suitability for a specific purpose. 10 - SOLICITATION OF INVESTMENT - None of the Protected Contents constitutes nor can be construed as solicitation of investment, and shall not be an assumption nor an element of assessment by the User to any investments and/or financial transactions. 11 - TRADEMARKS - The User acknowledges and agrees that the Gestore Mercati Energetici and GME trademarks are the property of GME. The User declares to be aware that the trademarks listed above, as well as any other trademark that may be published on the Website, belong to their respective owners and agrees not to use them without their prior written consent. 12 – AMENDMENTS - GME reserves the right to amend the General Terms and Conditions at any time and without notice, publishing it on the Website. In order to ensure the knowledge of any changes in the General Terms and Conditions at each access to the Protected Contents, the User shall review the General Terms and Conditions applicable at that time. The User acknowledges and also agrees that GME has the right to amend and/or hide, at any time and at its discretion, in whole or in part, the content of the Website, without notice. 13 – PROCESSING PERSONAL DATA VIA INTERNET - As additional information on the processing of personal data published on the Website in accordance with Article 13 of Legislative Decree of 30 June 2003, no. 196, GME represents that it may come to know and store the IP address of the User used to connect to the Website. GME is also entitled to store information from the User's computer in the form of files (files commonly referred to as "cookies"). The storage of these information allows for greater customization of information services offered to the User and facilitates the procedure of access by the latter. The User has, in any case, the right to limit or block the storage of cookies by changing the parameters of his/her/its browser. The User accepts these General Terms and Conditions and consents to the processing of his/her/its personal data processed electronically for purposes related to the use of the Website and to the access to the Protected Contents. 14 - CONTACTS - For more information concerning these General Terms and Conditions, or the limits of use of the Protected Contents, or the release of licenses on the Protected Contents for commercial purposes, the User may contact GME to the following address: Gestore dei Mercati Energetici S.p.A., Viale Maresciallo Pilsudski, 122/124, 00197 Rome (Italy), tel.: +39 06 8012 1, fax: +39 06 8012 4524. 15 - LAW AND JURISDICTION - These General Terms and Conditions are governed by and will be construed in accordance with Italian law, by European Union law and by the applicable international conventions. For any disputes arising from (or relating to) these General Terms and Conditions and/or the use of the Website, the Courts of Rome (Italy) will have exclusive jurisdiction.
